title: Scaling up transmission, hydro policy in power ministry's 100-day plan
description: Power ministry prioritizes enhancing transmission lines, hydro policy, PSP, sovereign green bonds, and cost reflective tariff. It aims to strengthen the network, sanction projects, boost energy storage, ensure cost recovery, and seek viability gap funding for battery projects.
